moduleInfo.moduleDesc: Module for HiAnime (formerly Zoro). Subs are now supported on newer versions of Ketsu.

javascriptConfig.javaScript: function processData(response) { var dataArray = []; var parser = new DOMParser(); var doc = parser.parseFromString(response, 'text/html'); var items = doc.querySelectorAll('.flw-item'); items.forEach(function(item) { var title = item.querySelector('img').alt; var link = 'https://hianime.to' + item.querySelector('a').href.replace('/watch',''); var image = item.querySelector('img').dataset.src; dataArray.push({ title: title, link: link, image: image }); }); return dataArray; }

function processData(response) { var dataArray = []; var parser = new DOMParser(); var doc = parser.parseFromString(response, 'text/html'); var items = doc.querySelectorAll('.flw-item'); items.forEach(function(item) { var title = item.querySelector('img').alt; var link = 'https://hianime.to' + item.querySelector('a').href.replace('/watch',''); var image = item.querySelector('img').dataset.src; dataArray.push({ title: title, link: link, image: image }); }); return dataArray; }
